metadata.title: CVE-2017-15906 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The process_open function in sftp-server.c in OpenSSH before 7.6 does not properly prevent write operations in readonly mode, which allows attackers to create zero-length files.

notes.note: leosilva> file structure and patch mismatch, some ajustments required

criterions.comment: openssh package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:7.6p1-4').
